
CKEditor DeepaMehta Customization
=================================

Inside the Webclient module CKEditor is located at /src/main/resources/web/script/vendor/ckeditor/
This is CKEditor 4.3.1

This is a custom build as configured via http://ckeditor.com/builder
The purpose for the custom build is we don't need all the languages.
On the builder page we can proceed with the defaults:

    - Preset: Standard
    - Plugins: no changes against preset
    - Skin: "Moono"
    - Languages: English
    - Source: optimized


CKEditor Configuration
----------------------

No DeepaMehta specific configurations so far.
